law.catch_line: A member is entitled to eligibility service during a leave of absence if the leave of absence:...

text.section:
A member is entitled to eligibility service during a leave of absence if the leave of absence:
is approved by the Board of Trustees under regulations that apply to all members similarly situated; and
is not otherwise recognized as eligibility service under this subtitle.

To receive service credit for a leave of absence described under subsection (a) of this section, a member shall pay the member contributions with regular interest, if any, as determined by the Board of Trustees under regulations that apply to all members similarly situated.
